attributes.action: To sack Tottenham MP David Lammy from his post in parliament
attributes.additional_details: As a tax payer and a UK citizen I think MP David Lammy is using his status within the parliament to go against the UK people for voting out in the latest EU referendum. As tax payers we should move on and stop wasting the people's money for personal gain. Start listening to the people of the UK
attributes.background: As a tax payer and a UK citizen I think MP David Lammy is using his status within the parliament to go against the UK people for voting out in the latest EU referendum. As tax payers we should move on and stop wasting the people's money for personal gain.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
